description:
Pascal-sensei is apparently also a member of a comedy duo, and is so confident that he doesn`t need to practice.
But once on stage, that confidence seems to have turned into something much much less impressive...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Pascal from the Comic Duo! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
Manzaishi Pascal ya de! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
漫才師パスカルやでっ! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳
